_comment: ADS7056 - 14-bit, 2.5 MSPS SAR ADC from Texas Instruments
description: ADS7056 14-bit, 2.5 MSPS SAR ADC, low power, SPI interface
_comment_V_FS: Full scale voltage, V (AVDD range: 2.35V to 3.6V, typical 3.3V)
_comment_ENOB: Effective number of bits (typical for 14-bit ADC)
_comment_power_consumption_2_5MSPS: Power consumption at 2.5 MSPS, W (3.5 mW at AVDD 3.3V)
_comment_power_consumption_100kSPS: Power consumption at 100 kSPS, W (158 µW at AVDD 3.3V)
_comment_max_sclk: Maximum SPI clock frequency, Hz (60 MHz)
_comment_input_range: Input voltage range (0V to AVDD, where AVDD = 2.35V to 3.6V)
